title: Google I/O
description: Google I/O is back May 18-20, online, and free for everyone. Join us live.
I/O is live keynotes, hands-on learning with Google experts, and a first look at the latest developer products.
Make sure to check back for more updates!

title: Bugs
description: Calendar: Jump to date dialog box is accepting response in two saves
Events: Images in event popup are not showing in web deployed version

title: Elijah
description: Family is Power, Niklaus.

title: Klaus
description: Read the poem The Poison Apple.

title: Delegation
description: Q. How many programmers does it take to change a light bulb?
A. None – It’s a hardware problem

title: The Originals
description: I was never naive enough to think that I was your light, but there is light in you.
All that anger, the cycle of abuse that Mikael began, you can end it.
You have to, so you can be the light for your little girl. For Hope.
— Cami to Klaus in No More Heartbreaks

title: Rise of Flutter
description: Is flutter going to kill Native Android?
It already is known fact, flutter can be used for cross platform app development
Meanwhile Google has came up with the solution of independence from JVMs.

title: Loops
description: How to keep a programmer in the shower forever.
Show him the shampoo bottle instructions: Lather. Rinse. Repeat.

title: Klaus
description: You've heard of me.
Fantastic!

title: Arrays
description: Q. Why did the programmer quit his job?
A. Because he didn't get arrays.

title: 'Coz I kept quiet that day
description: From the glimpses of the past
By the glitters of today
For the glimmers of tomorrow
People come n go n stay
But it opened my eyes
When I remembered that day
That's why I kept quiet
I kept quiet today
linkText: Listen to one of my poems

title: Hardware vs. Software
description: What's the difference between hardware and software?
You can hit your hardware with a hammer, but you can only curse at your software.

title: Stefan
description: Whenever you are ready for me, I'll be ready for you

title: Damon
description: If your are gonna be bad, be bad with purpose.
Otherwise you're not just forgiving.

title: Ross & Rachel
description: Rachel: Do you think it's easy for me to see you with somebody else?
Ross: Hey you were the one who ended it, remember ?
Rachel: Yes because I was mad at you. Not because I stopped loving you.

title: Whack A Mole
description: I have completed my Whack A Mole game

title: Eva
description: Isn't it funny ?
The people who we despise the most,
Are the people who are most like us
